suppress.notes: This CVE only affect Multiplatform Gradle Projects, which this project is not.
This CVE is a false positive as the description refers to a GO library (github.com/containers/storage).
This CVE is a false positive as javalite isn't affected according to: https://cloud.google.com/support/bulletins#gcp-2022-001
This CVE is tracked externally and is therefore suppressed in the automatic audit checks.
